meanings: Noun ten million, millions of times
Adverb very much, greatly, by no means, in no way
as much as[no less than] ten million won

examples.korean: The project has been budgeted at ten million francs. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사업을 위한 예산으로 천만 프랑이 책정되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Ten million francs has been budgeted for the project. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 천만 프랑이 그 사업을 위한 예산으로 책정되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Ten million francs has been budgeted for the project. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The US has agreed to cancel debts totalling $10 million. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 미국이 총 천만 달러에 이르는 부채를 탕감해 주는 데 동의했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The US has agreed to cancel debts totalling $10 million. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He’s worth ￡10 million. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 천만 파운드에 달하는 자산가이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
